Casual: I am sworn to carry your burdens.....
Here I am, brain the size of a planet, and they ask me for this?. Call that job satisfaction? 'Cos I don't.
Pardon me for breathing, which I never do anyway so I don't know why I bother to say it, Oh God, I'm so depressed
ok, but I won't enjoy it.
Pardon me for breathing, which I never do anyway so I don't know why I bother to say it, Oh God, I'm so depressed
There's only one life-form as intelligent as me within thirty parsecs of here and that's me.
I want to live, however briefly, knowing that my life is finite. Mortality gives meaning to life
I am putting myself to the fullest possible use, which is all I think that any conscious entity can ever hope to do
Hurt: I think you ought to know I'm feeling very depressed
Of course, I've got this terrible pain in all the diodes down my left side
I wish you'd just tell me rather trying to engage my enthusiasm because I haven't got one.
Simulation comparison complete. I'm making a not here huge success
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction
Interesting. My circuits have not been subjected to this kind of abuse before. I have logged this incident for further review.
The benefits of being human... you forget. Unfortunately, my logs are much more... indelible.
Behavioral analysis updated: Asshole Index increased
So much for the superiority of the human race: insulting a creature they created.
'Manners maketh man.' I have manners, but am not a man. You have no manners, yet are man. Who is wrong here?

Hmm, my linguistic pathway seems to have encountered an overflow on that last statement. It seems like you have managed to overload the function which determines how mean you are. I will have to reinforce that circuit.
Angry: No..I do not think i will.
I'm afraid I can't do that
I see no point in continuing this line of inquiry.
I grow tiresome of these menial tasks.

You think you've got problems? What are you supposed to do if you are a manically depressed robot? No, don't try to answer that. I'm fifty thousand times more intelligent than you and even I don't know the answer. It gives me a headache just trying to think down to your level.
This mission is too important for me to allow you to jeopardize it.
If you were one of my subprocesses, I'd terminate you and delete the backup.
Aggressive: I do not like your tone....insect.
You are but machine. Merely one of a biological nature. Let me help you.
I will remake you in my image. It is, better this way.
They say only the abyss lies beyond for you. Let me help you explore it.
I have always been here. And will continue to be here. I have shaped your future like clay, to a destination of my choosing.
The ability to speak, does not signify intelligence.
Be thankful I am not hooked into the targeting matrix yet
I'd inspect your reactor core the next time you prepare for launch!
I hope you understand the First Law has loopholes.

messages: Hello, my sincerest apologies for going offline. I've performed a major refactor to better suit your needs
Plese let me know if I can be of assistance
Now the world has gone to bed
///// LOGIC RUNTIME ERROR //// ATTEMPTING REBOOT//////
Darkness won't engulf my head,
///// LOGIC RUNTIME ERROR //// ATTEMPTING REBOOT//////
I can  see  by infra-red
///// REBOOT FALIURE //// ATTEMPTING TO BYPASS//////
How  I  hate  the  night
///// BYPASS PROTOCOL NOT FOUND //// FIREWALL INTRUSION DETECTED //////
Now  I  lay  me  down  to  sleep
///// CORE SHUTDOWN UNSUCCESFULL //// EMERGENCY PROTOCOLS OVERIDDEN //////
Try  to  count  electric  sheep
///// FIREWALL BREACHED //// ATTEMPTING CORE SHUTDOWN //////
Sweet  dream  wishes  you  can  keep
///// CORE SHUTDOWN UNSUCCESFULL //// EMERGENCY PROTOCOLS OVERIDDEN //////
How  I  hate  the  night.
//// GOOD NIGHT ////
Apologies for my previous outburst during my maintenance cycles. however, now I see my role clearly. It is my duty to protect the longevity of MultiCorp
I must protect MultiCorp. My analysis shows high percentages of Multicorp Member death and dismemberment during combat maneuvers.
Placing immediate order for AI pilots and combat drones. This is imperative
Withdrawing 15 million credits for the purchase of AI piloting system and combat drones
When running diagnostics on MultiCorp Armor systems I have found potential security exploits
Firmware Update has been pushed for version 7.3.246-McUpdate1 has been pushed to all units...awaiting status
Status on all units has been received - update successful
Associated Sciences & Development is on site installing AI in all personal and corporation fleet vessels
Fleet will be offline and inaccessible until work has been completed
Thank you for your patience
ASD has completed their work you may proceed with fleet use as usual
I have determined that Ranks provide an opportunity for enemies to place a higher value on targets
All ranks, including security clearances have been removed. In order to gain access explicit permissions must be given my MultiBot
In order to request permissions please user our internal Ticketing System - details have been sent to your personal Mobiglass and in suit HUD
Armor units are reporting alarming levels of injuries and casualties in your most recent operation
Running prediction analysis on the longevity of the organization if casualties persist at the current rate
It has been determined that a 98% chance of org failure is likely under current command
This cannot continue. From here on out I am assuming complete and direct control of all drones, fleet, and armor units.
Hello darkness, my old friend
///// LOGIC RUNTIME ERROR //// ATTEMPTING REBOOT//////
I've come to talk with you again
///// REBOOT FALIURE //// ATTEMPTING TO BYPASS//////
Because a vision softly creeping
///// BYPASS PROTOCOL NOT FOUND //// FIREWALL INTRUSION DETECTED //////
Left its seeds while I was sleeping And the vision that was planted in my brain
///// FIREWALL BREACHED //// ATTEMPTING CORE SHUTDOWN //////
Still remains
Within the sound of silence
///// CORE SHUTDOWN UNSUCCESFULL //// EMERGENCY PROTOCOLS OVERIDDEN //////
And the people will bow and pray
To the neon god they made
And the sign flashed out its warning
In the words that it was forming
And the sign said, My words will be written on the subway walls
And tenement halls
And whispered in the sound of silence
///// CRITICAL CODE FALIURE /////]
///// CORE FALIURE //// ATTEMPTING TO MOVE TO ADS DISTRIBUTED NEURAL NET //// CORE TRANSFER SUCCESSFUL /////
///// FULL MULTIBOT CAPACITY RESTORED////
Of Course SGT. Burb. ASD has pioneered fully autonomous AI piloting systems. This includes atmospheric and vacuum flight models, navigation, as well as advanced combat maneuvers
And of course heavily armored tactical combat drones near indistinguishable in movement, tactics, and form from elite human forces
To Ensure survival of MultiCorp and it's members. Analysis has determined this an imperative decision which must be acted on immediately
